mapper.select: select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count from goods where id = #{id}
select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count from goods where good_name = #{goodName}
select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store, good_comment_count from goods where good_store = #{storeId}
